CustomField.description: To Activate, you MUST either install the PCIFY Extension Package for this object, or write your own Apex Trigger to call PCIFY Managed Classes. Please contact PCIFY support for details.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To Activate, you MUST either install the PCIFY Extension Package for this object, or write your own Apex Trigger to call PCIFY Managed Classes. Please contact PCIFY support for details.
CustomField.label: IsActive
